name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: ‚ÄúI guess I'm debating you, not him [Biden], but that's ok"

Donald Trump clashes with debate host Chris Wallace after he challenges the President about his plan to replace Obamacare 

Latest updates: https://t.co/a7JgkzeNo8 #Debates2020 https://t.co/fgJ9LjjHaU

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: ‚ÄúI have a mask right here, I put a mask on‚Ä¶ when I think I need it‚Äù

Donald Trump produces a mask when asked about face coverings to help prevent spread of Covid-19

Joe Biden says ‚ÄúMasks make a big difference... it matters‚Äù

Latest updates: https://t.co/a7JgkzeNo8 #Debates2020 https://t.co/sPI0WtU71m

name: BBCWorld
text:
President Trump says he had to close the greatest economy in US history

It was doing well before the pandemic - continuing the trend under President Obama - but there have been periods in the past when it was stronger #BBCRealityCheck

https://t.co/cunjxrZGKx #Debates2020 https://t.co/XzCsyjtpcM

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: ‚ÄúWe handed him a booming economy, he blew it‚Äù

Joe Biden criticises Donald Trump's handling of the economy 

The president replies ‚Äúthey said it would take a miracle to bring back manufacturing, I brought back 700,000 jobs‚Äù 

https://t.co/a7JgkyXbZy #Debates2020 https://t.co/dk1DXBxSi3

text: Helen Reddy: Australian singer of feminist anthem I Am Woman dies https://t.co/kHgeEjVnDL

name: BBCWorld
text:

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: "Once the winner is declared after all the votes are counted, that will be the end of it"

Joe Biden says he will support the outcome of the election either way

Donald Trump, however, raised concerns about voter fraud: "They cheat"

Latest: https://t.co/a7JgkzeNo8 #Debates2020 https://t.co/9pSvz4BC8h

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: "Proud Boys, stand back and stand by‚Äù

Donald Trump responds to question asking him to condemn white supremacists and militia groups

He says ‚Äúsomebody‚Äôs got to do something about antifa and the left, because this is not a right wing problem‚Äù

https://t.co/a7JgkzeNo8 #Debates2020 https://t.co/9gpuhjSCw1

name: BBCWorld
text:
Joe Biden said 100m Americans had pre-existing conditions

The president said that was ‚Äútotally wrong‚Äù

Govt says 50-129 million non-elderly Americans have pre-existing conditions

Other organisations have different estimates

#BBCRealityCheck #Debates2020 https://t.co/09doQHaRzn https://t.co/fxB0caYVec

name: BBCWorld
text: RT @BBCNews: US election 2020: Trump and Biden clash in primetime debate https://t.co/uJNpxOeGkS

name: BBCWorld
text:
Joe Biden said before Covid "manufacturing went into a hole‚Äù

But prior to the pandemic, manufacturing jobs increased by almost half a million during President Trump's first three years in office

For more fact-checking: https://t.co/o31qhwkxq3
#BBCRealityCheck #Debates2020

name: BBCWorld
text:
